name: newburg
content:

(especially of shellfish) served in a sauce made from cream, butter, sherry (= a type of strong wine), and egg yolks: The menu included lobster Newburg and steak tartare. The shrimp in Newburg sauce was served on buttered toast.
More examplesFewer examplesFor main courses we had the seafood Newburg and the braised pork shank. Serve this great tasting shrimp Newburg over rice, puff pastry shells, or on toast. We had baked lobster with sautéed shallots, a light newburg sauce, and buttered crumbs.
